text: Hi, is it possible to catch a specific type of exception in Julia? Been browsing around it seems that the workaround is with if-else, which seems pretty ugly, so was wondering if this has been supported in latest stable Julia version (1.5.3).

elements.text: Hi, is it possible to catch a specific type of exception in Julia? Been browsing around it seems that the workaround is with if-else, which seems pretty ugly, so was wondering if this has been supported in latest stable Julia version (1.5.3).

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

```try
    foo
catch SomeError
    bar
finally
    qux
end```
